rewardRules.label: Basic BiddinG Rules
content: • Early Bird Bonus: 1 DOT : 12 BNC (+20%)
• Early bird period: 4/22 10am ~ 4/30 10am (UTC)
• Base Bonus: 1 DOT : 10 BNC
• SALP Extra Bonus: 0.1 BNC/DOT
• Soft Cap: 300,000 DOT (no bonus for exceeding the soft cap)
• Total Auction Bonus: 3,600,000 BNC
• Unlocking method: linear release in blocks within 96 weeks

rewardRules.label: Last Winner Rules
content: • Initial Prize Pool: 5,000 BNCs
• Prize pool injection: additional 5% of the BNC reward earned for participation (matched by the Bifrost Foundation, no participant reward taken)
• Launch Date: 4/22 10am UTC
• Refresh countdown: 3min (30 blocks, countdown refreshes every time an address successfully participates)
• Participation threshold: 5 DOT / 10 DOT / 20 DOT (every 6 hours without ending, the participation threshold doubles)
• Winning method: the last participant at the end of the countdown gets all BNCs in the prize pool

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: linear release in blocks within 96 weeks

Early reward(20 UNQ for the first DOT contributed, 5.28 for the last.

rewardRules.label: Note
content: Please use the reward Calculator on Unique Network's website to estimate your UNQ rewards at the time of the contribution. Link to the calculator https://unique.network/token/crowdloan/contribute/

rewardRules.label: Whitelist Criteria:
content: 1.NFT Holder: You hold a Chelobrick or a Substrapunk in your wallet as of 14th March 2022 at 2 pm UTC.
2.Polkadot NFT Ambassador Badge Holder: You have a wallet address that received a Polkadot NFT badge.
3.Quartz Crowdloan Contributor: You contributed KSM to the Quartz Crowdloan and are currently using the Substrate address.
4.Participated in Unique Token Public sale: You have a Receiving DOT Address.
To receive additional 5% in bonus rewards, please use any of the above whitelisted addresses to contribute towards the Unique Network Crowdloan.

The whitelisting bonuses will be calculated and added to your rewards at teh end of the crowdloan. You only need to make sure that you are participating in the crowdloan from your whitelisted DOT address.

rewardRules.label: MintFest Bonus for Crowdloan Contribution
content: To receive an extra 5% bonus reward for your crowdloan contribution, you will need to mint an NFT collection with at least one NFT on UniqueMinter between 14th March at 2 p.m. UTC and the end of the crowdloan.

rewardRules.label: Super Supporters Program (SSP)
content: 15% in bonus rewards for 10,000 DOT or more in contributions from one wallet address (total contribution by each address will be counted at the end of the crowdloan).
30% in bonus rewards for 100,000 DOT or more in contribution from one wallet address (total contribution by each address will be counted at the end of the crowdloan).

rewardRules.label: Basic Rewards
content: - Contribution of 1 $DOT will return 24 $PHA as reward. 15% will unlock immediately, and the rest will be linearly vesting for 96 weeks.
- No whitelist, No early birds, No referral reward. We think you are already tired of this! We distribute bonuses directly to all contributors equally.

rewardRules.label: The extra reward will be:
content: - Old Gangster bonus: Contributors from previous Khala Kusama auction and polkadot auction will have a 10% extra reward, in addition to the ones who have over 300 $PHA on Khala address before blockheight #902400. Remember to use the same contribution address.

- Time-limited reward: limited Phala World NFT whitelist eligibility: Phala will give out a special reward: NFT whitelist qualification for Phala Network's native metaverse game-mode project Phala World (PW). There are a total of 1,500 whitelist qualifications for the reward.  The effective time of the reward competition will end before the PW official whitelist qualification competition begins. Phala Crowdloan contributors who are ranked in the top 1,500 according to the DOT contribution will receive this reward. Please refer to the official announcement time of PW for the specific end date of the event.

content.text: All participants in the Litentry crowdloan will receive LIT as reward for their contributions. The amount of the rewards depend on the total amount of DOT which has been contributed by others at the time of your contribution.
bulletPoints: Contribution for 0-500,000 will receive 12 LIT per contributed DOT as a reward
Contribution for the raised DOT between 500,001 - 1,500,000 DOT will receive 8 LIT per contributed DOT as reward
Contribution for the raised DOT between 1,500,001 -3,000,000 DOT will receive 4 LIT per contributed DOT as reward
The total reward for the 3M DOT raised is 20M LIT
Refer friends and share a 10% referral bonus(Referer 5%, referee 5%).
Referral bonus equals 10% of the amount of basic reward the referee receives: Referral bonus = Basic Reward * 10%.

Previous participants in Polkadot auction batch 1 or 2 will receive compensation, if re-enter Litentry Crowdloan in Polkadot auction batch 3. The Failure compensation in batch1 and batch 2 will be distributed on Litmus.The compensation ratio is LIT : DOT= 0.12 : 1.

- contributions made before HydraDX is leading the race by 15% will receive between 280 and 125 HDX per DOT

- contributions made after HydraDX is leading the race by 25% will receive between 28 and 12.5 HDX per DOT

rewardRules.label: Vesting schedule
content: DX rewards are distributed linearly. The distribution will start after HydraDX has been onboarded as a Polkadot parachain and the transition from Snakenet (our testnet) has been completed.
